quote: “I believe in some blending of hope and sunshine sweetening the worst lots. I believe that this life is not all; neither the beginning nor the end. I believe while I tremble; I trust while I weep.”
author: Charlotte Bronte

quote: “What you do is what matters, not what you think or say or plan.”
author: Jason Fried

quote: “Self-esteem comes from being able to define the world in your own terms and refusing to abide by the judgments of others.”
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: “It is our wounds that create in us a desire to reach for miracles. The fulfillment of such miracles depends on whether we let our wounds pull us down or lift us up towards our dreams.”
author: Jocelyn Soriano

quote: “Never let anybody guess that you have a mind of your own. Above all be pure”
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: “Nobody gets praised for the right reasons.”
author: Diana Wynne Jones

quote: “I do like the world quite a lot.”
author: Shannon Hale

quote: “The dream was always running ahead of me. To catch up, to live for a moment in unison, was the miracle.”
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: “Truth builds trust.”
author: Marilyn Suttle

quote: “Here lies one whose name was writ on water.”
author: John Keats

quote: “Fear defeats more people than any other one thing in the world.”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: “Everything will be alright in the end so if it is not alright it is not the end.”
author: Deborah Moggach

quote: “she lived with hurricane eyes and fell in love with the way the waves collapsed against her cheeks.”
author: Christopher Poindexter

quote: “In your own life it's important to know how spectacular you are.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “But there's always a first time for everything”
author: Melissa de la Cruz

quote: “This was not a fearie tale. This was not the movies. This was life. It hurt more. It was excruciating. It was excruciatingly beautiful.”
author: Francesca Lia Block

quote: “Philosophy of science is about as useful to scientists as ornithology is to birds.”
author: Richard Feynman

quote: “I can tell you I love you as many times as you can stand to hear it, but all it does is remind us that love is not enough. Not even close.”
author: Mark Andrus

quote: “It is this belief in a power larger than myself and other than myself which allows me to venture into the unknown and even the unknowable.”
author: Maya Angelou

quote: “If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.”
author: Les Brown

quote: “No matter how safe and beautiful it is, a cage is still a cage.”
author: Jessica Spotswood
